sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import BlockContent from '@sanity/block-content-to-react' import './WritingItem.scss' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import Text from '../Text/Text'; const WritingItem = ({ writing }) => ( {writing.year} {writing.publication} {writing.excerpt ? {writing.excerpt} : null } {writing.statement ? {writing.statement} : null} ) export default WritingItem
